dogecoin.text: 2017, Degens where pumping their bags, 2021, @elonmusk is pumping his bag! Just saying how pathetic it looks for a visionary! #dogecoin #Bitcoin #ETH The world deserved better from @elonmusk ! Not #HODL #Bitcoin is fine, but moving market with shady tactics is not! 📢authorities!

The fact that @elonmusk thinks he could shepherd #dogecoin out of the blue (he just got into #crypto recently 🤣), shows how centralized it is?! 🤔 Wondering if anyone except #SatoshiNakamoto himself could make such an attempt on #Bitcoin ?! 😇 Remember #BCH #BSV saga?!

I think #elongate has pissed off the entire #cryptocurrency community at this point, it befits him to sell his #Bitcoin and/or any other #cryptocurrency holding except #dogecoin and go all in with guts?! @elonmusk are you up for the challenge?! 😅
Assuming he injects his entrepreneurial spirit into #dogecoin -pos, the development itself would still be centralized, unlike #Bitcoin  or #ETH, which would march ahead in the long-term!

Assuming he moves #dogecoin to proof-of-stake as well, but then he would now be against the entire #cryptocurrency community & late to the proof-of-stake party by at least 5 years! He would probably arrive at the same design trade-offs as current pos systems.

Two, I think he is inventing an inferior DeFi than the #ETH ecosystem. His recent thread about increasing the block-size of #dogecoin misses the point - which is...the world has already moved towards Proof-of-stake, and #eth2 is clearly winning!
